Also I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> and to all this people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Listen <S%H8085><s%> not to the words <S%H1697><s%> of your prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto you <S%H559><s%>, saying, Behold <S%H3627><s%>, the vessels of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall now shortly <S%H4120><s%> be brought again <S%H7725><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%>: for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie unto you <S%H8267><s%>.
Listen <S%H8085><s%> not unto them <S%H5647><s%>; serve the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%>: therefore should this city <S%H5892><s%> be laid waste <S%H2723><s%>?

But if they be prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and if the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with them <S%H6293><s%>, let them now make intercession to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which are left <S%H3498><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, go <S%H935><s%> not to Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> concerning the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and concerning the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and concerning the bases <S%H4350><s%>, and concerning the residue <S%H3499><s%> of the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that remain <S%H3498><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>,

Which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> not <S%H1540><s%>, when he carried away captive Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and all the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>;
